website_summaries.verdict: If you don't mind the bulk, the Jabra GO 6430 is a good office headset for the mobile professional.
pros: The Jabra GO 6430 works with both cell phones and VoIP applications
It comes with a Bluetooth dongle and a travel charger
cons: The Jabra GO 6430 has a very loose fit in the ear and is quite bulky

customer_reviews.title: Great bluetooth headset, some microphone quality issues
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these headsets to use with my new job, where I'm often on conference calls since many individuals in our office work remotely. The earphone quality is great and I have no problem hearing others on the line. Sometimes I get complaints about the microphone quality, especially in windy situations (or when you're near an air vent). It works well enough for me to not immediately replace it, but I'll probably look elsewhere if it stops working. (I don't imagine that'll be anytime soon, thankfully). After 6 months of ownership, it still holds a charge of at least several hours. (I don't often need to talk more than that between charges!)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is a good product, but I wanted more from it
customer_reviews.text: I switched shortly within 3 months of purchase. I work from home and there is an AFB near my home. Whenever planes would fly over, customers heard the noise. It is a good product, but I wanted more from it. Outside of the noise issue in the background, it is am awesome product for the price!
customer_reviews.author: PgB

customer_reviews.title: Works well with both iPhone and MS Lync
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this headset for a few months for several hours a day with both an iPhone 4S and Microsoft Lync on a Win 7 PC and I am happy with it. People I talk to have no complaints about the quality of sound (and neither do I).
customer_reviews.author: Marko Jennings

customer_reviews.title: Good Lync Headset
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this headset for over a year now with very few complaints. It has good battery life and will typically last me all day even on with heavy call volume. It can be paired to a PC and Mobile phone at the same time which is handy. It has excellent range when paired to the PC as I can roam my entire house without issue.
customer_reviews.author: S. Barrett

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient
customer_reviews.text: Great product.. Has made my work a lot easier and convenient.. Wish it was a little smaller (like regular bluetooth size) Range is actually pretty good (i can walk all over my house and still be connected. I have it on for 10-12hrs straight a day with no problem.. Have recommended to co-workers...
customer_reviews.author: Aud

customer_reviews.title: Awesome device for working from home with VOIP.
customer_reviews.text: with the over-the-head band, this thing is awesome! I also have the USB charger stand that I connect to my work laptop when I'm at home. Together with the bluetooth dongle and Cisco Jabber, I have a fully functional work phone and no one is the wiser that I'm actually 50 miles away from the office on days when I work at home. At less than $90, it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: T. Dooley

customer_reviews.title: Review to help
customer_reviews.text: works but wow that ear piece is not happy on me so had to use the full headset with it. It works as advertised other than that.
customer_reviews.author: Blackmoon

customer_reviews.title: Really nice device with good sound quality and range.
customer_reviews.text: This device does really well, it has exceptionally good sound quality, and I can easily walk all over our office with it and not have issues.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch

customer_reviews.title: Only complaint I have is the end pokes into the ...
customer_reviews.text: Only complaint I have is the end pokes into the curve of my ear and begins to hurt after a while. I assume this has to do with my ear shape/size and that not everyone would have this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Makes internet calling a breeze!
customer_reviews.text: I am a Jabra fan, but most of the headsets are hundreds of dollars. This one gives great performance for a fraction of the cost!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Hutchinson

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality product
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality product, I got one and had to return it because it stop working after 2 days. The new one worked for a few weeks,... then I didn't use it for a few months, after that, it won't function properly. I have problems turning the device on, problems for it to charge, and poor signal. I have owned the Jabra brand before and it worked well, but this one I just don't know what to say.
customer_reviews.author: Leyland Wong

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed to listen to business conference call on the laptop but not be attached to it by a wire. It's the perfect headset that does everything that it says it does.
customer_reviews.author: Lililoo

customer_reviews.title: Jabra go 6430
customer_reviews.text: It works great, but it didn't get a 5 star because it only had one ear piece and that one hurt my ear they are supposed to be sending me another, but for that price it should have had a choice. Also it does not allow for all features on my softphone
customer_reviews.author: eugene

customer_reviews.title: We have to use the headband instead of the ear piece.
customer_reviews.text: The ear piece is not very fit to the shape of our ears, I had try all the diffferent one which come with the set. The mic is not very stable when we are turning our head or moving. My clients and my office keep asking me where am I? They thought I called them from a cave.....
customer_reviews.author: Celine Lau

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I got this for work and it is brilliant. Although I cannot seem to be able to get it to work with both cell phone and landline, but that may be operator dependent.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel McLean

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This product did not come with manual. The charge does not last at all within 2 hours and you need to charge it again.
customer_reviews.author: Elisa Finch

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Fast and easy setup. Works great without having to install any hardware in the computer. Has fair distance you can stray from your computer if necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Fitnessguy

customer_reviews.title: Not a Jabra GO 6430
customer_reviews.text: This product is being sold as a Jabra GO 6430 but DealKing is sending a $40.00 Logitech devince instead! If you are looking for the JAbra GO 6430 do not buy this item. If you are looking for a Logitech BH870 - you can find it $70.00 cheaper here on Amazon from another supplier. Totally misrepresented.
customer_reviews.author: Corinne A Bedard

customer_reviews.title: To big/falls off
customer_reviews.text: My boss wanted me to buy this for my phone so I can call into meetings while driving. This thing is so big and hard to get on your ear, it also falls off your ear when turning your head. I am returning this and getting a different device. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Tronix

customer_reviews.title: Worked decent for a while
customer_reviews.text: It was OK but not for the price. I'm having issues with sound quality and need to replace already. It is rarely used for just over a year old.
customer_reviews.author: Ontherocks

customer_reviews.title: The battey life last 3 hours
customer_reviews.text: Not worth it. Drops calls frequently. will randomly lose power and shut off. I am entirely dis-satisfied with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

product_meta.title: Jabra GO 6430 Bluetooth Headset and USB Adapter for Softphone & Mobile Phone
product_meta.description: Jabra's GO 6430 Bluetooth headset delivers dual device connectivity to mobile and softphone applications, as well as superior audio performance and protection for mobile workers who need to stay in touch no matter where work takes them.
feature_bullets: Multi-device Connectivity - Multi-device connectivity technology lets you manage phone calls from several different devices such as desk phones, tablets, PCs and smartphones, with one single headset.

Remote Call Control - Answer and end calls on the Jabra audio device with seamless integration between your phone and headset. With a Jabra wireless audio device you can control your call even when you are away from your desk.
100 Meter /300 feet Wireless FreedomFeaturing Bluetooth Class 1, your Jabra device enables you to connect to a vast range of devices from smart phones and tablets to laptop computers.
HD Voice - High quality audio for crystal clear conversations Enjoy high-definition sound with HD Voice and get crystal clear, intelligible communication
HD Voice - High quality audio for crystal clear conversations Enjoy high-definition sound with HD Voice and get crystal clear, intelligible communication

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.2 out of 5 stars35 ratings3.2 out of 5 stars
